member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Describes the subresources of a texture that are accessible from a depth-stencil view.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Format
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the viewing format. For allowable formats, see Remarks.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies how the depth-stencil resource will be accessed. This member also determines which _DSV to use in the following union.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Flags
member.summary:
A combination of enumeration constants that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies whether the texture is read only.
Pass 0 to specify that it isn't read only; otherwise, pass one or more of the members of the D3D12_DSV_FLAGS enumerated type.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture1D
member.summary: A structure that specifies a 1D texture subresource.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture1DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies an array of 1D texture subresources.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture2D

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DArray
